DOC.detailed_description: The Aorfix™ Stent Graft currently CE-marked product indicate AAA angle aneurysm < 65o . The objective study evaluate safety performance bifurcate Aorfix™ Stent Graft treatment infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm aorto-iliac aneurysm , infrarenal neck angulate > 60o ( 60 90 degree ) measure 3-dimensional reconstruction order widen indication . The investigation prospective open label , single arm , multi-centre clinical study . The study group consist 25 evaluable participant . In order account patient lose follow ( estimate approximately 20 % ) 30 patient enrol study .

Infrarenal neck minimum length 15 mm neck angulation 60° 90° , assess 3 dimension . The iliac artery diameter must appropriate diameter ( 1 mm small device diameter ) , appropriate distal landing length .
